comment: /**  * Create a {@link Message} to be sent.  * @param session the JMS {@link Session} to be used to create the  * {@code Message} (never {@code null})  * @return the {@code Message} to be sent  * @throws javax.jms.JMSException if thrown by JMS API methods  */
code: /**  * Create a {@link Message} to be sent.  * @param session the JMS {@link Session} to be used to create the  * {@code Message} (never {@code null})  * @return the {@code Message} to be sent  * @throws javax.jms.JMSException if thrown by JMS API methods  */ Message createMessage(Session session) throws JMSException.
